channel.title: Allstar Base - 317 - Teleport to random places
channel.description: is there a code that makes someone teleport to random places. i mean i have a custom spell and i want it to teleport the victim to a random place. if its delta based please convert it.. Thanks //Leo

item.title: Allstar Base - 317 - Teleport to random places
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Leoiscool, post:3, topic:394370”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=491554.msg3594617#msg3594617 date=1304959324]

int x = (int) (Math.random() * MAX_X_COORDINATE);
int y = (int) (Math.random() * MAX_Y_COORDINATE);
Location location = new Location(x, y, 0);
player.setLocation(location);

That’s basically what you would have to do. Just replace the variables and classes with those proper to your server base.
[/quote]
i get this error…

client.java:29436: cannot find symbol
symbol : class Location
location: class client
Location location = new Location(x, y, 0);
^
client.java:29436: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable player
location: class client
player.setLocation(location);
^

and thats it.[/quote]

Because that code was for my server (or how I would expect it to be).

As I said

zyle1992:

That’s basically what you would have to do. Just replace the variables and classes with those proper to your server base.

Read full topic
item.source: Allstar Base - 317 - Teleport to random places
